sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has a top base of length 7 cm, a bottom base of length 12 cm, and two non-parallel sides of length 9 cm each. What is the perimeter of the trapezium?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply add the lengths of all four sides together.

Perimeter = top base + bottom base + left side + right side
Perimeter = 7 cm + 12 cm + 9 cm + 9 cm
Perimeter = 37 cm

The perimeter of the trapezium is 37 cm.
